text: Haga modongoohia ina gi digaula bolo Au go Tagi go Yihowah go di God mouli, Au hagalee manawa lamalia gi di made o tangada huaidu. Au bolo mee gii huli hoou gi daha mo ana haihai huaidu gi mouli ia. Goodou go digau Israel, goodou lawa mai gi daha mo godou haihai huaidu. Goodou e aha ala e hiihai gi di made?
